short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mention autocomplete for users, posts and products inside comments on Product Hunt (www.producthunt.com)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes it easy to search for users or posts on Product Hunt and insert an appropriate @username or link to an post.

Start with an @ for user search and # for posts.

Have fun!
